definition[0]: a form of a word that shows you are talking about more than one thing, person etc. For example, ‘dogs’ is the plural of ‘dog’
example[0]: ‘Sheep’ remains the same in the plural.
definition[1]: a plural word or form shows you are talking about more than one thing, person etc. For example, ‘we’ is a plural pronoun.
definition[2]: a plural society, system, or culture is one with people from many different religions, races etc
example[2]: Britain has developed into a plural society.
